content: **knitted and felted sitting mat in 2 strands drops andes the piece is worked back and forth with garter stitch theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #mossycomfortmat drops design pattern an-077 yarn group e + e or f ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** after felting approx 35 x 35 cm before felting approx 39 x 43 cm **yarn** drops andes from garnstudio belongs to yarn group e 200 g colour 7820 green 200 g colour 0619 beige if you want the sitting mat in one colour you will need 300 g **needles** drops circular needle size 9 mm length 60 cm **knitting gauge** 9½ stitches in width and 18 row in height with 2 strands and garter stitch on needle size 9 mm = 10 x 10 cm after felting 10½ stitches in width and 22 row in height = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
